testcase.name: Check the price When increase the Quantity
testcase.system-out: Given user is on ebay homepage..............................................passed When user types shoes in serach box.........................................passed And user click on search button.............................................passed Then user should able to see all shoes products.............................passed Given user is on shoes Resultpage of Ebay website...........................passed When user select one product of the shoes...................................passed And user select shoes colour and size.......................................passed And user add the product of shoes to basket.................................passed And user increase the shoes quantity........................................passed Then user able to see shoes price is increase as per quantity...............passed
